title: Sale Week Idea
body: So Anklespankin (youtuber) does a thing where he makes league of legends videos depending on the day. So for example Mid Monday, Top Tuesday, Jungle thursday or something like that. So i was wondering how awesome it would be if riot made a week when each day (Mon to Fri) 3 champions go on sale for each position. For example, on Monday Zed, Lux and Viktor coculd be on sale for mid monday, on tuesday gnar, jayce and maokai could be on sale for top tuesday. Even if it was just for one week a year or soemthing. Just a thought Riot
